languages.text: Ходили слухи, что Ардженту заманили туда обманом и бросили некие бывшие соратники, а может быть — и сам{mf||а} {name} фон Валанциус, не желавш{mf|ий|ая} ни губить сестру, ни мириться с ее свирепым стремлением очистить Простор от ереси. Правда это или нет — неизвестно, но многие вздохнули с облегчением после ее исчезновения.

Rumours said that Argenta was lured there under false pretences by her former allies. It may have even been {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self, unwilling to kill her off or tolerate her raging desire to cleanse the Expanse of heresy. No one knows the truth, but many gave a sigh of relief after her disappearance.
languages.original_text: Ходили слухи, что Ардженту заманили туда обманом и бросили некие бывшие соратники, а может быть — и сам{mf||а} {name} фон Валанциус, не желавш{mf|ий|ая} ни губить сестру, ни мириться с ее свирепым стремлением очистить Простор от ереси. Правда это или нет — неизвестно, но многие вздохнули с облегчением после ее исчезновения.

traits.locale_text: Rumours say that Argenta was lured there under false pretences by some former allies, maybe even by {name} von Valanius {mf|him|her}self, not willing to dispatch of the sister, nor tolerating her raging desire to cleanse the Expanse from heresy. Whether this is true or not, no one knows. Yet, many sighed with relief after her disappearance.

Rumours say that Argenta was lured there under false pretences by some former allies, maybe even by {name} von Valanius {mf|him|her}self, not willing to dispatch of the sister, nor tolerating her raging desire to cleanse the Expanse from heresy. Whether this is true or not, no one knows. Yet, many sighed with relief after her disappearance.

Rumours said that Argenta was lured there under false pretences by former allies. It may have even been {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self, unwilling to kill her off or tolerate her raging desire to cleanse the Expanse of heresy. No one knows the truth, but many gave a sigh of relief after her disappearance.

Rumours said that Argenta was lured there under false pretences by former allies. It may have even been {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self, unwilling to kill her off or tolerate her raging desire to cleanse the Expanse of heresy. No one knows the truth, but many gave a sigh of relief after her disappearance.

Rumours said that Argenta was lured there under false pretences by her former allies. It may have even been {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self, unwilling to kill her off or tolerate her raging desire to cleanse the Expanse of heresy. No one knows the truth, but many gave a sigh of relief after her disappearance.

Rumours said that Argenta was lured there under false pretences by her former allies. It may have even been {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self, unwilling to kill her off or tolerate her raging desire to cleanse the Expanse of heresy. No one knows the truth, but many gave a sigh of relief after her disappearance.

languages.text: 有传言说，阿洁塔是被她曾经的盟友引诱到那里的，甚至可能是{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯本人做的。{mf|他|她}不愿意杀死她，但也不愿意容忍她对净化扩区的强烈渴望。没有人知道真相，但得知她失踪之后，许多人都松了一口气。
languages.original_text: Rumours said that Argenta was lured there under false pretences by her former allies. It may have even been {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self, unwilling to kill her off or tolerate her raging desire to cleanse the Expanse of heresy. No one knows the truth, but many gave a sigh of relief after her disappearance.

traits.locale_text: 有传言说，阿洁塔是被曾经的盟友引诱到那里的，甚至可能是{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯本人做的。{mf|他|她}不愿意杀死她，但也不愿意容忍她对净化扩区的强烈渴望。没有人知道真相，但得知她失踪之后，许多人都松了一口气。

languages.text: Gerüchten zufolge wurde Argenta von früheren Verbündeten unter Vorspiegelung falscher Tatsachen dort hingelockt. Vielleicht war es sogar {name} von Valancius selbst, {mf|der|die} weder bereit war, sie selbst zu töten, noch aber ihr brennendes Verlangen zu dulden, die Ketzerei in der Ausdehnung auszulöschen. Niemand kennt die Wahrheit, doch viele seufzten nach ihrem Verschwinden erleichtert auf.
languages.original_text: Rumours said that Argenta was lured there under false pretences by her former allies. It may have even been {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self, unwilling to kill her off or tolerate her raging desire to cleanse the Expanse of heresy. No one knows the truth, but many gave a sigh of relief after her disappearance.

traits.locale_text: Gerüchten zufolge wurde Argenta von früheren Verbündeten unter Vorspiegelung falscher Tatsachen dort hingelockt. Vielleicht war es sogar {name} von Valancius selbst, {mf|der|die} weder bereit war, sie selbst zu töten, noch aber ihr brennendes Verlangen zu dulden, die Ketzerei in der Ausdehnung auszulöschen. Niemand kennt die Wahrheit, doch viele seufzten nach ihrem Verschwinden erleichtert auf.

languages.text: On raconte qu'Argenta y avait été attirée sous de faux prétextes par ses anciens alliés. {mf|Le|La} responsable était peut-être même {name} von Valancius, qui ne pouvait se résoudre à la tuer, mais ne tolérait pas non plus son désir effréné de purger les Étendues de toute hérésie. Personne ne connaît la vérité, mais beaucoup soupirèrent de soulagement à l'annonce de sa disparition.
languages.original_text: Rumours said that Argenta was lured there under false pretences by her former allies. It may have even been {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self, unwilling to kill her off or tolerate her raging desire to cleanse the Expanse of heresy. No one knows the truth, but many gave a sigh of relief after her disappearance.

traits.locale_text: On raconte qu'Argenta y avait été attirée sous de faux prétextes par d'anciens alliés. {mf|Le|La} responsable était peut-être même {name} von Valancius, qui ne pouvait se résoudre à la tuer, mais ne tolérait pas non plus son désir effréné de purger les Étendues de toute hérésie. Personne ne connaît la vérité, mais beaucoup soupirèrent de soulagement à l'annonce de sa disparition.

languages.text: Según los rumores, los antiguos aliados de Argenta la atrajeron hasta allí con mentiras. Tal vez fuera {name} von Valancius en persona, que no osó matarla, pero tampoco toleraba su deseo irrefrenable de purgar toda herejía de la Extensión. Nadie conoce la verdad, pero muchos respiran más tranquilos tras su desaparición.
languages.original_text: Rumours said that Argenta was lured there under false pretences by her former allies. It may have even been {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self, unwilling to kill her off or tolerate her raging desire to cleanse the Expanse of heresy. No one knows the truth, but many gave a sigh of relief after her disappearance.

traits.locale_text: Según los rumores, los antiguos aliados de Argenta la atrajeron hasta allí con mentiras. Tal vez fuera {name} von Valancius en persona, que no osó matarla, pero tampoco toleraba su deseo irrefrenable de purgar toda herejía de la Extensión. Nadie conoce la verdad, pero muchos respiran más tranquilos tras su desaparición.

languages.text: 噂によると、アルジェンタはかつての同盟国によって偽りの口実でそこに誘い込まれたらしい。それは、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス自身であったのかもしれないとまでされている。彼女を殺したくなかった、あるいはエクスパンスから異端を一掃したいという彼女の荒れ狂う欲望を容認したくなかったのだろう。真相は誰にもわからないが、彼女の失踪後、多くの人が安堵のため息をついた。
languages.original_text: Rumours said that Argenta was lured there under false pretences by her former allies. It may have even been {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self, unwilling to kill her off or tolerate her raging desire to cleanse the Expanse of heresy. No one knows the truth, but many gave a sigh of relief after her disappearance.

traits.locale_text: 噂によると、アルジェンタはかつての同盟国によって偽りの口実でそこに誘い込まれたらしい。それは、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス自身であったのかもしれないとまでされている。彼女を殺したくなかった、あるいはエクスパンスから異端を一掃したいという彼女の荒れ狂う欲望を容認したくなかったのだろう。真相は誰にもわからないが、彼女の失踪後、多くの人が安堵のため息をついた。

languages.text: Söylentilere göre Argenta, eski müttefiklerinin yalan iddialarına kanarak oraya gitmişti. Hatta onu oraya gönderen, onu öldüremeyen fakat onun Enginlik'i kâfirlikten temizleme arzusundan rahatsız olan {name} von Valancius'un bizzat kendisi olabilirdi. Kimse gerçeği bilmiyor. Tek bilinen, o ortadan kaybolunca sayısız kişinin derin bir oh çektiğidir.
languages.original_text: Rumours said that Argenta was lured there under false pretences by her former allies. It may have even been {name} von Valancius {mf|him|her}self, unwilling to kill her off or tolerate her raging desire to cleanse the Expanse of heresy. No one knows the truth, but many gave a sigh of relief after her disappearance.

traits.locale_text: Söylentilere göre Argenta, eski müttefiklerinin yalan iddiaları nedeniyle oraya gitmişti. Bunların kaynağı, onu öldüremeyen ama onun Enginlik'i kâfirlikten temizleme arzusunu da tolere edemeyen {name} von Valancius'un kendisiydi belki de. Kimse gerçeği bilmiyor ancak o ortadan kaybolunca sayısız kişinin derin bir oh çektiği de gerçek.
